name: rdkit-react
one_line_profile: Script to perform chemical reactions on molecules using RDKit
detailed_description: A Python script that utilizes RDKit to apply chemical reaction transformations (SMARTS) to a set of reactant molecules, generating product structures.

name: reagent_emb_vis
one_line_profile: Visualization tool for exploring reagent roles in chemical reactions
detailed_description: A tool for reaction data exploration that creates a map of reagents, identifying regions of similar reagent purposes to aid in understanding reaction roles.

name: Jupyter Dock
one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter Notebooks for molecular docking protocols
detailed_description: A set of interactive Jupyter Notebooks designed for performing molecular docking, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

name: ElectrochemicalKinetics.jl
one_line_profile: Electrochemical reaction rate modeling library
detailed_description: A Julia library for modeling electrochemical reaction rates and generating nonequilibrium phase maps using automatic differentiation.

name: RxnIM
one_line_profile: Multimodal Large Language Model for chemical reaction image parsing
detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Towards Large-scale Chemical Reaction Image Parsing via a Multimodal Large Language Model', converting reaction images to structured text.

name: MaterialParser
one_line_profile: Parser for chemical terms into structured chemical formulas
detailed_description: A utility to compile strings of chemical terms into data structures representing chemical formulas and compositions, useful for text mining in materials science.

name: id-mapper
one_line_profile: ID mapping tool for biological entities
detailed_description: A tool to map identifiers for biological entities such as metabolites, reactions, and genes across different databases.

name: rdkit-scripts
one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit scripts for cheminformatics tasks
detailed_description: A repository of Python scripts utilizing RDKit for various cheminformatics tasks, simplifying common molecular manipulation and analysis workflows.

name: rdeditor
one_line_profile: Simple RDKit-based molecule editor GUI
detailed_description: A graphical user interface for editing molecules, built using RDKit and PySide, allowing users to draw and modify chemical structures.

name: scikit-mol
one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible classes for converting RDKit molecules into machine learning-ready vectors (fingerprints, descriptors).

name: CBRdb
one_line_profile: Curated biochemical reaction database
detailed_description: A curated database integrating and refining biochemical reaction data from KEGG and ATLAS to support precise analyses.

name: Molecules_Dataset_Collection
one_line_profile: Collection of molecular datasets for property inference
detailed_description: A collection of datasets containing molecules, intended for validating property inference models and machine learning tasks in chemistry.

name: Click
one_line_profile: Preprepared click chemistry reactions for RDKit
detailed_description: A collection of pre-defined reaction SMARTS for 'click chemistry' reactions, ready to be used with RDKit for reaction enumeration.

name: HeadTailAssign
one_line_profile: Head and tail atom assignment for polymerization
detailed_description: A tool that assigns head and tail atom positions in monomeric units or polymerization reactions represented in SMILES format.

name: XLMExtractor-chem-reaction
one_line_profile: Extractor for chemical reactions from patent XML files
detailed_description: A script to extract chemical reaction information from US patent XML files, specifically designed for the dataset curated by Daniel M Lowe.

name: pipelines
one_line_profile: Containerised cheminformatics components
detailed_description: A collection of containerised components and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry tasks, facilitating reproducible workflows.

name: Reaction_Data_Cleaning
one_line_profile: Chemical reaction data cleaning utilities
detailed_description: A Python library for cleaning and standardizing chemical reaction data, likely including tasks like atom mapping verification and reagent normalization.

name: psikit
one_line_profile: Interface between Psi4 and RDKit
detailed_description: A Python library that acts as a bridge between RDKit (cheminformatics) and Psi4 (quantum chemistry), facilitating quantum mechanical calculations on RDKit molecules.

name: Levenshtein
one_line_profile: Levenshtein SMILES augmentation for reaction datasets
detailed_description: A tool for augmenting reaction datasets using Levenshtein distance-based SMILES randomization, improving model robustness.

name: reaction_utils
one_line_profile: Utilities for chemical reaction datasets and templates
detailed_description: A collection of utilities for processing chemical reaction datasets, including reaction template extraction and handling.

name: ctfile
one_line_profile: Parser for chemical table files (CTfile)
detailed_description: A Python parser for the CTfile family of chemical file formats (Molfile, SDfile, etc.), enabling reading and writing of chemical structure data.

name: nfp
one_line_profile: Keras layers for molecular deep learning
detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

name: RanDepict
one_line_profile: Random chemical structure depiction generator
detailed_description: A utility to generate diverse chemical structure depictions with random styles and augmentations, useful for training optical chemical structure recognition (OCSR) models.

name: ccdutils
one_line_profile: Tools for PDB chemical component definitions
detailed_description: A set of Python tools using RDKit to handle and process chemical component definitions from the wwPDB Chemical Component Dictionary.

name: Free-Wilson
one_line_profile: Free-Wilson SAR analysis implementation
detailed_description: An implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit.

name: rd_filters
one_line_profile: Structural alert filtering using RDKit and ChEMBL
detailed_description: A script to filter molecules based on structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo) using RDKit and data from ChEMBL.

name: solubility
one_line_profile: ESOL solubility prediction implementation
detailed_description: An implementation of Delaney's ESOL method for estimating aqueous solubility of molecules using RDKit.

name: useful_rdkit_utils
one_line_profile: Collection of useful RDKit functions
detailed_description: A repository containing various helper functions and utilities for working with RDKit, addressing common cheminformatics tasks.

name: RadonPy
one_line_profile: Polymer physical property calculation library
detailed_description: A Python library to automate physical property calculations for polymer informatics, including molecular dynamics simulations.

name: cheminformatics-microservice
one_line_profile: Microservices for cheminformatics API calls
detailed_description: A set of microservices designed to provide cheminformatics functionality via API calls, supporting integration into larger systems.

name: SynTemp
one_line_profile: Graph-based reaction template extraction
detailed_description: A tool for extracting reaction templates from chemical reaction data using a graph-based approach.

name: ScaffoldGraph
one_line_profile: Library for scaffold network generation and analysis
detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built using RDKit and NetworkX for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and trees.

name: moldrug
one_line_profile: Drug-oriented optimization package on chemical space
detailed_description: A Python package designed for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space, utilizing genetic algorithms for molecular generation and optimization.

name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
one_line_profile: RDKit utilities for Jupyter Notebooks
detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the usage of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks, facilitating chemical data visualization and analysis.

name: Reaction Decoder Tool (RDT)
one_line_profile: Atom-Atom Mapping Tool for chemical reactions
detailed_description: A robust tool for extracting reaction templates and performing atom-atom mapping on chemical reactions, essential for reaction prediction and metabolic pathway analysis.

name: MolPipeline
one_line_profile: Scikit-learn wrapper for RDKit molecular processing
detailed_description: A Python package that integrates RDKit molecular processing into scikit-learn pipelines, enabling streamlined machine learning workflows for cheminformatics.

name: mols2grid
one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for dataframes
detailed_description: A Python tool that provides an interactive grid interface for viewing 2D molecular structures directly from pandas DataFrames, useful for chemical data exploration.

name: Chembience
one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for chemoinformatics services
detailed_description: A containerized platform designed to facilitate the development and deployment of chemoinformatics web applications and microservices.

name: chembl_beaker
one_line_profile: RDKit wrapper and REST API
detailed_description: A wrapper around RDKit that exposes its functionality, often used to provide chemical utility services in the ChEMBL ecosystem.

name: ProLIF
one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses, aiding in binding analysis.

name: rxn-ebm
one_line_profile: Energy-based modeling of chemical reactions
detailed_description: A framework for modeling chemical reactions using energy-based models, capable of scoring reaction feasibility and predicting outcomes.

name: rdchiral
one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware reaction template handling
detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling code that improves the management of stereochemistry during template extraction and application, critical for retrosynthesis.

name: retrotemp
one_line_profile: Template-based retrosynthesis prediction
detailed_description: A tool for performing retrosynthetic analysis by predicting reaction templates, implementing methodologies similar to Segler and Waller.

name: Datamol
one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library
detailed_description: A lightweight Python library built on top of RDKit that simplifies molecular processing, manipulation, and visualization tasks for cheminformatics.

name: chemistry_drawer
one_line_profile: Plotly-based molecule drawer
detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages Plotly to create interactive and high-quality drawings of chemical molecules.

name: Indigo Toolkit
one_line_profile: Universal cheminformatics toolkit and libraries
detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics toolkit providing libraries for molecule and reaction processing, canonicalization, and database search (Bingo), supporting multiple languages.

name: Indigo ELN
one_line_profile: Open Source Electronic Lab Notebook
detailed_description: An open-source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for chemistry, facilitating the recording, management, and searching of chemical experiments and reaction data.

name: Indigo (GGA Software)
one_line_profile: Cheminformatics toolkit (Legacy/Mirror)
detailed_description: A cheminformatics toolkit and RDBMS data cartridge (Bingo) for Oracle/SQL Server/PostgreSQL. (Note: Likely the predecessor or mirror of the EPAM Indigo toolkit).

name: Enzymemap
one_line_profile: Atom mapping and correction for enzymatic reactions
detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform atom mapping, correct reaction representations, and suggest enzymatic reactions, improving data quality for biocatalysis.

name: espsim
one_line_profile: Shape and ESP similarity scoring
detailed_description: A tool for calculating molecular similarity based on shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP) using RDKit, useful for virtual screening and bioisostere replacement.

name: ReactionDatabase
one_line_profile: Database of atom-mapped reaction SMILES
detailed_description: A structured collection of reaction properties including atom-mapped reaction SMILES, serving as a dataset resource for reaction prediction models.

name: templatecorr
one_line_profile: Hierarchical template correction for reactions
detailed_description: A Python tool for the hierarchical correction of reaction templates, aiding in the standardization and cleaning of reaction data for machine learning.

name: MolReactGen
one_line_profile: Causal language model for molecule and reaction generation
detailed_description: An auto-regressive causal language model based on GPT-2 for generating molecules (SMILES) and reaction templates (SMARTS), facilitating chemical space exploration.

name: xyz2mol
one_line_profile: Converts XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects with connectivity
detailed_description: A tool that converts Cartesian coordinates (XYZ) to molecular structures (RDKit Mol objects) by inferring connectivity and bond orders, useful for processing quantum chemistry output.

name: ChemRxnExtractor
one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting chemical reactions from scientific literature
detailed_description: A deep learning-based toolkit designed to automatically extract chemical reaction information (reactants, products, conditions) from scientific text, supporting data mining and database construction.

name: AQME
one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments for workflows
detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for generating conformers (RDKit/CREST), creating QM input files, and post-processing QM outputs, designed to streamline quantum chemistry tasks.

name: Retrosynthesis-Prediction
one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for retrosynthesis prediction
detailed_description: An implementation of Transformer sequence-to-sequence models for predicting retrosynthetic routes, including data augmentation strategies for reaction SMILES.

name: Scopy
one_line_profile: Library for negative design and HTS/VS database filtering
detailed_description: A Python library designed for high-throughput screening (HTS) and virtual screening (VS) database design, focusing on negative design (filtering out undesirable compounds) and calculating molecular descriptors.

name: scikit-chem
one_line_profile: High-level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
detailed_description: A cheminformatics library that provides a more Pythonic and high-level interface to RDKit, integrating well with the scientific Python stack (numpy, pandas) for molecular data analysis.

name: PIDGINv3
one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for chemical compounds using Random Forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis, aiding in drug discovery and target identification.

name: eMolFrag
one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS algorithm
detailed_description: A Python implementation of the BRICS algorithm for decomposing molecules into fragments, useful for fragment-based drug design and retrosynthetic analysis.

name: PoseBusters
one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
detailed_description: A test suite for validating generated molecular poses, checking for chemical and physical plausibility (e.g., bond lengths, clashes) to ensure quality in molecular docking or generative models.

name: OChemR
one_line_profile: Optical Chemical Reaction Recognition using Vision Transformers
detailed_description: A tool that uses Vision Transformers (DETR) to detect and classify molecules, text, and arrows from chemical reaction images, converting them into machine-readable formats like SMILES.

name: molecular_rectifier
one_line_profile: Automated correction of unsanitizable RDKit molecules
detailed_description: A utility to automatically fix and sanitize molecular structures that fail standard RDKit sanitization checks, handling common valence and connectivity errors.

name: rdkit_to_params
one_line_profile: Generates Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules
detailed_description: A tool to create and modify Rosetta topology (params) files from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating the use of small molecules in Rosetta modeling workflows.

name: MolVS
one_line_profile: Molecule Validation and Standardization library
detailed_description: A standard Python library for validating, standardizing, and salt-stripping chemical structures, ensuring data consistency for cheminformatics pipelines.

name: ODDT
one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for computer-aided drug discovery (CADD), providing unified interfaces for various cheminformatics backends (OpenBabel, RDKit) and implementing scoring functions and interaction fingerprints.

name: ORD Schema
one_line_profile: Schema and utilities for the Open Reaction Database
detailed_description: Provides the data schema (Protocol Buffers) and Python/JavaScript libraries for defining, validating, and manipulating chemical reaction data in the Open Reaction Database format.

name: RDKit
one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning software
detailed_description: The core RDKit library providing extensive functionality for cheminformatics, molecular modeling, descriptor calculation, and chemical data handling.

name: RDKit.js
one_line_profile: JavaScript port of the RDKit cheminformatics library
detailed_description: A JavaScript library that brings RDKit's cheminformatics capabilities to web browsers and Node.js, enabling client-side molecular rendering and processing.

name: chemicalite
one_line_profile: SQLite extension for storing and searching chemical structures
detailed_description: A chemical database extension for SQLite that adds support for molecular structure storage, substructure search, and similarity search directly within the database engine.

name: rxn-reaction-preprocessing
one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for chemical reaction datasets
detailed_description: A library for preprocessing chemical reaction data, offering functionalities for standardization, filtering, augmentation, and tokenization, developed by IBM Research.

name: rxn-standardization
one_line_profile: Chemical compound standardization using language models
detailed_description: A tool for standardizing chemical compounds and reaction representations, leveraging language models to ensure data consistency for downstream tasks.

name: rxnaamapper
one_line_profile: Reaction atom-mapping via language modeling
detailed_description: A tool for generating atom-to-atom mappings in chemical reactions using a language model approach, facilitating reaction understanding and mechanism analysis.

name: rxnfp
one_line_profile: Chemical reaction fingerprints and classification
detailed_description: A library for generating data-driven reaction fingerprints using attention-based neural networks, enabling reaction classification and chemical space mapping.

name: rxnmapper
one_line_profile: Unsupervised attention-guided atom-mapping tool
detailed_description: A state-of-the-art tool for extracting atom-to-atom mappings from chemical reactions using unsupervised learning and attention mechanisms from Transformer models.

name: LocalMapper
one_line_profile: Precise reaction atom-to-atom mapping tool
detailed_description: A tool for generating precise atom-to-atom mappings for chemical reactions, designed to handle complex reaction mechanisms.

name: ORDerly
one_line_profile: Cleaning and extraction of Open Reaction Database (ORD) data
detailed_description: A library and benchmark suite for extracting, cleaning, and structuring chemical reaction data from the Open Reaction Database (ORD) for machine learning applications.

name: pharmacophore-toolkit
one_line_profile: Simple pharmacophore model generation from RDKit
detailed_description: A toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from molecular structures using RDKit, aiding in drug design and virtual screening.

name: molplotly
one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization for Plotly
detailed_description: An add-on for Plotly that enables interactive visualization of chemical structures (2D images) on mouseover events in scatter plots.

name: RDMC
one_line_profile: Reaction Data and Molecular Conformers package
detailed_description: A package for handling chemical reactions, molecules, and conformers, with a focus on 3D structure manipulation and analysis.

name: Reagents
one_line_profile: Reagent prediction model using Molecular Transformer
detailed_description: A tool for predicting reagents in chemical reactions using a Molecular Transformer architecture, improving data for reaction product prediction in a self-supervised fashion.

name: AutoWRFChem-Base
one_line_profile: Automation workflow for running WRF-Chem simulations
detailed_description: Stand-alone code to automatically run WRF-Chem simulations with NEI and MEGAN emissions and MOZART boundary conditions, facilitating atmospheric chemistry modeling.

name: Reaction Condition Recommendation
one_line_profile: Machine learning model for reaction condition prediction
detailed_description: Code for training and deploying machine learning models specifically designed to recommend reaction conditions for organic chemistry reactions.

name: Equivariant-Graph-Transformer
one_line_profile: Hybrid EGNN and Transformer for molecular property prediction
detailed_description: A deep neural network architecture combining Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN) and Transformers for accurate prediction of molecular properties.

name: SMILES Transformer
one_line_profile: Pre-trained molecular fingerprinting using Transformers
detailed_description: Implementation of the SMILES Transformer for generating pre-trained molecular fingerprints, useful for low-data drug discovery tasks.

name: MPerformer
one_line_profile: SE(3) Transformer-based Molecular Perceptron
detailed_description: An SE(3) Transformer-based model designed for molecular property prediction, leveraging geometric deep learning.

name: WGFormer
one_line_profile: SE(3)-Transformer for molecular conformation prediction
detailed_description: An SE(3)-Transformer driven by Wasserstein Gradient Flows for predicting molecular ground-state conformations.

name: Llamol
one_line_profile: Dynamic multi-conditional generative transformer for molecular design
detailed_description: A generative transformer model capable of de novo molecular design conditioned on multiple dynamic properties.

name: t5chem
one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for chemical reaction tasks
detailed_description: A unified Transformer-based model (T5) for various chemical reaction tasks including reaction prediction, retrosynthesis, and property prediction.

name: ChemCoTBench
one_line_profile: LLM Reasoning Benchmark & Dataset for Chemistry
detailed_description: A benchmark and Chain-of-Thoughts dataset designed to evaluate Large Language Models on chemistry reasoning tasks.

name: ABT-MPNN
one_line_profile: Atom-bond transformer-based MPNN for molecular properties
detailed_description: An Atom-Bond Transformer-based Message Passing Neural Network (ABT-MPNN) for accurate molecular property prediction.

name: TyphoFormer
one_line_profile: LLM-Augmented Transformer for Typhoon Track Prediction
detailed_description: A spatial-temporal transformer model augmented with LLMs for predicting typhoon tracks, serving the domain of meteorology and earth science.

name: Organic Reaction Prediction NMT
one_line_profile: NMT-based organic reaction prediction
detailed_description: An implementation of Neural Machine Translation (NMT) with attention mechanisms for predicting organic chemistry reactions.

name: Levenshtein SMILES Augmentation
one_line_profile: Data augmentation tool for chemical reaction datasets using Levenshtein distance
detailed_description: A Python utility for augmenting reaction SMILES datasets by applying Levenshtein distance-based modifications, developed by MolecularAI (AstraZeneca) to improve robustness of chemical reaction models.

name: Deep Molecular Optimization
one_line_profile: Molecular optimization framework using Seq2Seq and Transformers
detailed_description: A deep learning framework for molecular optimization that captures chemical intuition using Sequence-to-Sequence models with attention mechanisms and Transformers, facilitating de novo molecular design.

name: EvalRetro
one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for single-step retrosynthesis algorithms
detailed_description: A comprehensive repository for evaluating and benchmarking various single-step retrosynthesis prediction algorithms, providing standardized metrics and datasets for chemical synthesis research.

name: SiGra
one_line_profile: Single-cell spatial elucidation using image-augmented graph transformers
detailed_description: A tool for single-cell spatial analysis that integrates histology images and gene expression data using a graph transformer model to elucidate spatial domains and cell-cell interactions.

name: GET
one_line_profile: Generalist Equivariant Transformer for 3D molecular interaction learning
detailed_description: Implementation of the Generalist Equivariant Transformer (GET) for modeling 3D molecular interactions, applicable to tasks like protein-ligand binding and molecular property prediction.

name: MEGANet
one_line_profile: Multi-scale Edge-Guided Attention Network for polyp segmentation
detailed_description: A deep learning model for medical image segmentation, specifically designed for polyp detection in colonoscopy images using multi-scale edge-guided attention mechanisms.

name: Meganet.m
one_line_profile: MATLAB library for Deep Learning as Optimal Control (SciML)
detailed_description: A MATLAB framework implementing deep learning architectures as discretized optimal control problems (ODEs), widely used in scientific machine learning and inverse problems.

name: EnvRtype
one_line_profile: R toolkit for environmental characterization and genomic prediction
detailed_description: An R package for collecting environmental data from GIS platforms and performing environmental characterization, specifically designed for genomic prediction of reaction norms in ecology and breeding.

name: Rexgen Direct
one_line_profile: Template-free prediction of organic reaction outcomes using graph neural networks
detailed_description: A data-driven, template-free approach for predicting the outcomes of organic chemical reactions. It treats reaction prediction as a graph-to-graph translation problem, identifying reaction centers and generating product structures directly from reactant graphs without relying on predefined reaction templates.

name: SolTranNet
one_line_profile: Aqueous solubility prediction using molecular transformers
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting the aqueous solubility of organic molecules. It utilizes a Transformer-based architecture adapted for SMILES strings to estimate LogS values, aiding in drug discovery and chemical property screening.

name: MALT
one_line_profile: High-throughput sequence alignment tool for metagenomics
detailed_description: MALT (MEGAN Alignment Tool) is a sequence alignment and analysis tool designed for processing high-throughput sequencing data, specifically for metagenomic analysis.

name: MEGAN Community Edition
one_line_profile: Interactive tool for metagenomic data analysis and visualization
detailed_description: MEGAN (MEtaGenome ANalyzer) is a comprehensive toolbox for interactively analyzing and comparing microbiome data, allowing users to explore the taxonomic and functional content of their data.

name: GREAD
one_line_profile: Graph Neural Reaction-Diffusion Networks for modeling dynamic systems
detailed_description: GREAD implements a graph neural network framework designed to model reaction-diffusion processes, applicable to physics and chemical dynamics simulations.

name: synthesis-dags
one_line_profile: Search algorithm over molecule synthesis DAGs for retrosynthesis
detailed_description: Implements an approach to search over molecule synthesis Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs), facilitating single-step and multi-step retrosynthesis planning.

name: LocalTransform
one_line_profile: Predicting organic reaction outcomes using local graph transformations
detailed_description: LocalTransform is a template-free reaction prediction model that predicts organic reactivity by learning local graph transformations.

name: MolTrans
one_line_profile: Molecular Interaction Transformer for Drug-Target Interaction Prediction
detailed_description: MolTrans is a deep learning framework that uses substructure pattern mining and interaction modeling to predict drug-target interactions.

name: Deep-Synthesis
one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for chemical synthesis prediction
detailed_description: A framework utilizing sequence-to-sequence models for predicting chemical reaction outcomes and retrosynthetic pathways.

name: MoleculeDiffusionTransformer
one_line_profile: Molecular generation using diffusion and autoregressive transformers
detailed_description: A model for generating molecular structures combining diffusion models with autoregressive transformer architectures, developed at MIT.

name: RXNGraphormer
one_line_profile: Unified framework for reaction performance prediction and synthesis planning
detailed_description: Official implementation of RXNGraphormer, a pre-trained deep learning framework designed for cross-task chemical reaction performance prediction and synthesis planning.

name: Graph-DiT
one_line_profile: Graph Diffusion Transformer for Multi-Conditional Molecular Generation
detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Diffusion Transformer (Graph-DiT) for generating molecular graphs under multiple conditions.

name: Transformer-M
one_line_profile: Transformer model for understanding 2D and 3D molecular data
detailed_description: Transformer-M is a versatile molecular model that can process and understand both 2D topology and 3D geometric structures of molecules.

name: Graphormer
one_line_profile: General-purpose deep learning backbone for molecular modeling
detailed_description: Graphormer is a graph transformer model designed as a general-purpose backbone for various molecular modeling tasks, including property prediction and conformational analysis.

name: MEGAN (Molecule Edit Graph Attention Network)
one_line_profile: Modeling chemical reactions as sequences of graph edits
detailed_description: MEGAN models chemical reactions by predicting a sequence of graph edits to transform reactants into products, useful for reaction prediction.

name: MolecularTransformerEmbeddings
one_line_profile: Transformer for translating molecular text representations and embeddings
detailed_description: A Transformer neural network trained to translate between different molecular text representations (e.g., SMILES, IUPAC) and generate molecular embeddings.

name: citationchaser
one_line_profile: Tool for forward and backward citation chasing in systematic reviews
detailed_description: An R package and Shiny app for performing forward and backward citation chasing as part of an evidence synthesis project, helping researchers identify relevant literature.

name: nerfacc
one_line_profile: General NeRF acceleration toolbox
detailed_description: A PyTorch toolbox for accelerating Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) training and rendering, providing efficient sampling and rendering modules for 3D reconstruction research.

name: nerfstudio
one_line_profile: Modular framework for Neural Radiance Fields development
detailed_description: A collaboration-friendly studio for NeRFs, providing a modular API to create, train, and visualize NeRFs, standardizing the workflow for 3D reconstruction research.

name: Difix3D
one_line_profile: 3D reconstruction improvement using diffusion models
detailed_description: A tool for improving 3D reconstructions using single-step diffusion models, specifically addressing artifacts in 3D geometry generation.

name: TransVAE
one_line_profile: Transformer-based VAE for molecular design
detailed_description: A Transformer-based Variational Autoencoder (VAE) architecture designed for de novo molecular design, enabling the generation of novel chemical structures.

name: PDEBench
one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for scientific machine learning (PDEs)
detailed_description: An extensive benchmark for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML), providing datasets and code for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using various neural network architectures.

name: MultiStepRetrosynthesisTTL
one_line_profile: Multi-step retrosynthesis prediction tool
detailed_description: A tool for multi-step retrosynthesis planning based on Augmented Disconnection Aware Triple Transformer Loop Predictions, facilitating synthetic route design.

name: rxn_yields
one_line_profile: Chemical reaction yield prediction and data augmentation
detailed_description: A library for predicting chemical reaction yields using machine learning models, including data augmentation strategies to improve prediction accuracy.

name: mist
one_line_profile: MS/MS spectra encoder for molecular property inference
detailed_description: A tool for encoding Mass Spectrometry (MS/MS) spectra using formula transformers to infer molecular properties, aiding in metabolite identification.

name: reaction_yield_nn
one_line_profile: Uncertainty-aware chemical reaction yield prediction
detailed_description: A graph neural network implementation for predicting chemical reaction yields with uncertainty quantification.

name: egt
one_line_profile: Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer library
detailed_description: Implementation of Edge-Augmented Graph Transformers, a neural network architecture effective for modeling molecular graphs and other structured scientific data.

name: egt_pytorch
one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer
detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer, facilitating its application in tasks like molecular property prediction.

name: UnboundedNeRFPytorch
one_line_profile: Unbounded and large-scale NeRF implementation
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for training Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) on unbounded 360-degree scenes, useful for large-scale 3D environment reconstruction.

name: DirectVoxGO
one_line_profile: Fast radiance field reconstruction via voxel grid optimization
detailed_description: A tool for fast Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) reconstruction using direct voxel grid optimization, significantly speeding up training and rendering times.

name: pixel-nerf
one_line_profile: NeRF from one or few images
detailed_description: An implementation of PixelNeRF, a learning framework that predicts continuous neural scene representations from one or a few input images.

name: linchemin
one_line_profile: Toolkit for linked chemical information and route analysis
detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing linked chemical reaction data, providing interfaces to computer-aided synthesis prediction (CASP) tools and metrics for synthetic route analysis.

name: ReLM
one_line_profile: Language models for chemical reaction prediction
detailed_description: A framework leveraging pre-trained language models to enhance chemical reaction prediction tasks, demonstrating the application of NLP techniques in chemistry.

name: taichi-nerfs
one_line_profile: High-performance NeRF implementations using Taichi
detailed_description: A collection of Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) variants implemented using Taichi and PyTorch, focusing on high-performance rendering and training.

name: grover
one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for molecular data
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GROVER, a self-supervised graph transformer pre-trained on large-scale molecular data for learning rich molecular representations.

name: ASKCOS
one_line_profile: Comprehensive software platform for computer-aided synthesis planning (CASP)
detailed_description: ASKCOS (Automated System for Knowledge-Based Continuous Organic Synthesis) is a platform that integrates various data-driven models to perform retrosynthetic analysis, forward reaction prediction, and reaction condition recommendation.

name: askcos-core
one_line_profile: Core Python library for the ASKCOS synthesis planning platform
detailed_description: Provides the backend logic and API definitions for the ASKCOS platform, handling tasks such as tree search management and model interfacing for chemical reactivity prediction.

name: ASKCOSv2 (Chemhacktica fork)
one_line_profile: Modified version of ASKCOSv2 for Chemhacktica project
detailed_description: A fork of the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning tool, adapted with specific configurations and features for the Chemhacktica initiative.

name: askcos2_core
one_line_profile: Core logic library for ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning
detailed_description: The core Python package powering the second version of the ASKCOS platform, providing improved algorithms for retrosynthetic route planning.

name: SynPlanner
one_line_profile: Tool for computer-aided synthesis planning
detailed_description: A software tool designed to assist chemists in planning synthetic routes for organic molecules using computational methods.

name: AiZynthFinder
one_line_profile: Retrosynthetic planning tool using Monte Carlo Tree Search
detailed_description: A robust tool for retrosynthetic planning that combines neural network-based policy and value networks with Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) to find synthetic routes.

name: DirectMultiStep
one_line_profile: Direct route generation for multistep retrosynthesis
detailed_description: A deep learning approach for predicting multistep retrosynthetic routes directly, rather than step-by-step.

name: ReTReK
one_line_profile: Data-driven retrosynthesis planning using knowledge graphs
detailed_description: An application for retrosynthesis planning that leverages retrosynthesis knowledge and data-driven strategies to propose synthetic pathways.

name: DESP
one_line_profile: Double-Ended Synthesis Planning with Goal-Constrained Bidirectional Search
detailed_description: A synthesis planning algorithm that uses bidirectional search to connect a target molecule to available starting materials, optimizing for convergence.

name: retrosynthesis_planner
one_line_profile: General purpose retrosynthesis planner
detailed_description: A Python-based planner for performing retrosynthetic analysis to identify potential synthetic routes for target molecules.

name: Syntheseus
one_line_profile: Standardized package for retrosynthetic planning algorithms
detailed_description: A library that provides a unified interface for various retrosynthesis planning algorithms and reaction models, facilitating benchmarking and development.

name: LightZero
one_line_profile: Unified benchmark and library for Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS)
detailed_description: A comprehensive MCTS library designed for general sequential decision scenarios, widely applicable to scientific planning tasks like molecular design and retrosynthesis.

name: RAscore
one_line_profile: Retrosynthetic Accessibility (RA) score calculator
detailed_description: A machine learning model to estimate the retrosynthetic accessibility (feasibility of synthesis) of chemical compounds, trained on CASP data.

name: ChemTS
one_line_profile: Molecule design using Monte Carlo Tree Search
detailed_description: A tool for de novo molecule design that combines Monte Carlo Tree Search with a recurrent neural network to generate novel chemical structures.

name: DP-ChemTS
one_line_profile: Distributed parallel framework for ChemTS
detailed_description: A distributed version of the ChemTS molecule design algorithm, enabling parallelized Monte Carlo Tree Search for accelerated discovery.

name: GraphRetro
one_line_profile: Graph-based models for retrosynthesis prediction
detailed_description: Implementation of graph neural network models for predicting retrosynthetic disconnections and reactants.

name: ASKCOSv2 (Mirror)
one_line_profile: Mirror of the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning platform
detailed_description: A mirror of the ASKCOSv2 project, providing computer-aided synthesis planning capabilities with specific customizations (Chemhacktica-flavored).

name: askcos2_core (Mirror)
one_line_profile: Mirror of the core library for ASKCOSv2
detailed_description: A mirror of the askcos2-core package, providing the underlying algorithms and logic for the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning system.

name: RDTool
one_line_profile: Optimized Reaction Decoder Tool for atom mapping
detailed_description: An optimized version of the Reaction Decoder Tool (RDTool) used for reaction atom mapping and analysis, essential for reaction data processing.

name: MANULS
one_line_profile: Electrostatic catalysis optimization program
detailed_description: A program designed to find the smallest electric field required to remove the reaction barrier for electrostatic catalysis of chemical reactions.

name: ReactiveDynamics.jl
one_line_profile: Julia package for reaction network dynamical systems
detailed_description: A Julia package implementing a category of reaction (transportation) network-type dynamical systems for modeling reactive dynamics.

name: aizynthfinder
one_line_profile: Retrosynthetic planning tool
detailed_description: A tool for retrosynthetic planning that uses neural networks and tree search algorithms to suggest synthesis routes for target molecules.

name: AARON
one_line_profile: Automated Reaction Optimizer for New catalysts
detailed_description: A tool that automates DFT optimizations of transition state (TS) structures for asymmetric catalytic reactions, facilitating catalyst discovery.

name: AROPS
one_line_profile: Automated Reaction Optimization with Parallelized Scheduling
detailed_description: A framework for automated reaction optimization that employs parallelized scheduling to efficiently explore reaction conditions.

name: SA_score
one_line_profile: Synthetic Accessibility score calculator
detailed_description: A standalone implementation for calculating the Synthetic Accessibility (SA) score of molecules, used to estimate the difficulty of synthesizing a compound.

name: pyGSM
one_line_profile: Reaction path optimization and discovery tool
detailed_description: A Python tool for thermal and photochemical reaction path optimization and discovery using the Growing String Method (GSM).

name: precomplex_generator
one_line_profile: Input structure generator for TS searches
detailed_description: A tool for generating suitable precomplex input structures for automated transition-state (TS) searches based on single-ended reaction path optimization algorithms.

name: reacnetgenerator
one_line_profile: Reaction network generator for MD simulations
detailed_description: An automatic reaction network generator designed for analyzing reactive molecular dynamics simulations and extracting reaction networks.

name: EDBO+
one_line_profile: Bayesian reaction optimization tool
detailed_description: EDBO+ (Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization) is a tool for chemical synthesis optimization, utilizing Bayesian optimization to recommend experimental conditions.

name: CrossSpeciesWorkflow
one_line_profile: CWL workflow for protein structure and phenotype prediction
detailed_description: A Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflow that integrates multiple third-party prediction methods for protein secondary structure, solvent accessibility, and modifications.

name: pysisyphus
one_line_profile: Reaction path and stationary point optimization suite
detailed_description: A Python suite for the optimization of stationary points on ground- and excited-state potential energy surfaces and the determination of reaction paths.

name: RNAsnap2
one_line_profile: RNA solvent accessibility prediction tool
detailed_description: A tool for single-sequence and profile-based prediction of RNA solvent accessibility using dilated convolution neural networks.

name: SYBA
one_line_profile: Synthetic Bayesian Accessibility scoring tool for organic compounds
detailed_description: A classification tool that calculates a score (SYBA) to estimate the synthetic accessibility of organic molecules based on the distribution of substructures in easy-to-synthesize and hard-to-synthesize datasets.

name: ChemOpt
one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning framework for chemical reaction optimization
detailed_description: A framework that utilizes deep reinforcement learning to optimize chemical reaction conditions, aiming to maximize yield or other objectives through automated exploration of the parameter space.

name: RAScore
one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing and classifying RAS protein structures
detailed_description: A specialized tool designed to analyze the structures of RAS proteins, facilitating the classification and study of this critical protein family in biology.

name: AZURE2
one_line_profile: R-Matrix minimization code for nuclear astrophysics reaction analysis
detailed_description: A specialized code for the analysis of complex multi-level multi-channel nuclear reactions, optimized for low energy charged particle reactions relevant to stellar nucleosynthesis.

name: CORDA
one_line_profile: Cost Optimization Reaction Dependency Assessment for metabolic models
detailed_description: A Python implementation for reconstructing genome-scale metabolic models using the CORDA algorithm, which assesses reaction dependencies to build concise metabolic networks.

name: Summit
one_line_profile: Machine learning platform for chemical reaction optimization
detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for optimizing chemical reactions, providing interfaces for various machine learning algorithms and benchmarks to accelerate the discovery of optimal reaction conditions.

name: gopt
one_line_profile: Library for molecular geometry optimization and reaction pathway determination
detailed_description: A Python library designed for optimizing molecular structures and finding chemical reaction pathways, suitable for computational chemistry workflows.

name: um6p-chemistry-kg
one_line_profile: NLP pipeline for constructing chemistry knowledge graphs from abstracts
detailed_description: A project utilizing NLP and graph techniques to extract information from chemistry research paper abstracts and construct a domain-specific knowledge graph.

name: 2pSAM_recon
one_line_profile: Reconstruction pipeline for two-photon synthetic aperture microscopy
detailed_description: A MATLAB-based reconstruction pipeline for two-photon synthetic aperture microscopy (2pSAM) incorporating digital adaptive optics (DAO).

name: cmc-knowledge-graph-setup
one_line_profile: Infrastructure for Chemistry, Manufacturing and Control (CMC) Knowledge Graph
detailed_description: A setup for creating and managing a Knowledge Graph focused on Chemistry, Manufacturing, and Control (CMC), including data integration and ontology management.

name: ChemEagle
one_line_profile: Multi-agent system for information extraction from chemical literature
detailed_description: A multi-agent framework designed to extract versatile information from chemical literature, enabling automated knowledge acquisition.

name: ChemDataExtractor
one_line_profile: Automated extraction of chemical property information from scientific documents
detailed_description: A toolkit for extracting chemical names, properties, and spectra from scientific text using NLP and rule-based methods.

name: ChemDataExtractor2
one_line_profile: Updated pipeline for chemical property extraction from text
detailed_description: Version 2.0 of ChemDataExtractor, offering improved capabilities for mining chemical information from scientific literature.

name: ChemLLMBench
one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for Large Language Models in chemistry tasks
detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark evaluating the performance of Large Language Models across eight different chemistry-related tasks.

name: DeepTrack2
one_line_profile: Deep learning library for particle tracking and image analysis
detailed_description: A modular Python library for generating, manipulating, and analyzing image data pipelines, specifically designed for deep learning in experimental imaging and particle tracking.

name: chemdataextractorTADF
one_line_profile: Specialized extractor for TADF material properties
detailed_description: A modified version of ChemDataExtractor tailored for extracting properties of thermally-activated delayed fluorescent (TADF) materials from literature.

name: pyopsin
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for OPSIN chemical nomenclature parser
detailed_description: A Python interface to OPSIN (Open Parser for Systematic IUPAC nomenclature), allowing conversion of IUPAC names to chemical structures.

name: ASKCOSv2
one_line_profile: Mirror of the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning project
detailed_description: A repository containing the code for ASKCOSv2, a platform for computer-aided synthesis planning and chemical reactivity prediction.

name: global-chem
one_line_profile: Knowledge graph and toolkit for common chemical names
detailed_description: A software toolkit and knowledge graph mapping common chemical names to their molecular definitions and SMILES strings, accessible via Python.

name: Retrieval-Retro
one_line_profile: Retrieval-based inorganic retrosynthesis tool
detailed_description: Implementation of a retrieval-augmented generation approach for inorganic retrosynthesis, incorporating expert knowledge.

name: py2opsin
one_line_profile: Simple Python interface to OPSIN
detailed_description: A lightweight Python wrapper for the OPSIN Java library, enabling systematic IUPAC nomenclature parsing to chemical structures.

name: Bio-Domain-Transfer
one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition under domain shift for life sciences
detailed_description: Implementation of metric learning approaches for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in life sciences, specifically handling domain shifts.

name: ZOSPy
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Zemax OpticStudio API
detailed_description: A Python library providing an intuitive interface to the Zemax OpticStudio API via .NET, facilitating optical simulations and analysis.

name: organic-chemistry-reaction-prediction-using-NMT
one_line_profile: Reaction prediction using Neural Machine Translation
detailed_description: An implementation of organic chemistry reaction prediction using Neural Machine Translation (NMT) models with attention mechanisms.

name: Material-Knowledge-Graph
one_line_profile: Large-scale knowledge graph for material science
detailed_description: A project providing a large-scale Knowledge Graph for material science, likely including scripts for construction or querying.

name: PyRhO
one_line_profile: Virtual optogenetics laboratory simulation tool
detailed_description: A Python module for simulating optogenetic tools and neurons, acting as a virtual laboratory for experimental planning and analysis.

name: BandgapDatabase1
one_line_profile: Code for generating a bandgap database using ChemDataExtractor
detailed_description: Scripts and tools to generate a database of bandgap values from literature using ChemDataExtractor.

name: OPSIN
one_line_profile: Open Parser for Systematic IUPAC Nomenclature to structure conversion
detailed_description: A Java library for converting IUPAC chemical nomenclature into semantic chemical structures (CML, SMILES, InChI). It supports a wide range of organic and inorganic nomenclature.

name: Patent Reaction Extraction
one_line_profile: Text mining toolkit for extracting chemical reactions from patents
detailed_description: A Java-based system for extracting chemical reaction information from patent text, including reactants, products, and conditions. It is designed to handle the complex linguistic structures found in patent literature.

name: ReactionDataExtractor v2
one_line_profile: Toolkit for extraction of information from chemical reaction schemes
detailed_description: An updated version of ReactionDataExtractor designed to automatically extract chemical reaction schemes and associated data from scientific literature, facilitating the creation of reaction databases.

name: MSTM-Spectrum
one_line_profile: Wrapper for Multiple Sphere T-Matrix code for SPR spectrum calculation
detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the Multiple Sphere T-Matrix (MSTM) code and Mie theory, used to calculate Surface Plasmon Resonance (SPR) spectra and fit them to experimental data.

name: LBNLP
one_line_profile: NLP tools for materials science and chemistry from LBNL
detailed_description: A collection of Natural Language Processing tools specifically designed for materials science and chemistry text mining, developed by the Lawrence Berkeley National Lab.

name: PatentChem
one_line_profile: Tool for downloading patents and finding related molecules
detailed_description: A tool that automates the downloading of USPTO patents and identifies molecules related to specific keyword queries, facilitating chemical patent analysis.

name: Bio-NER
one_line_profile: Biomedical Named Entity Recognition for diseases and chemicals
detailed_description: A library for Biomedical Named Entity Recognition (NER) and Normalization, focusing on diseases, chemicals, and genetic entities using state-of-the-art models.

name: PubChemPy
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the PubChem PUG REST API
detailed_description: A Python library that provides a convenient wrapper for the PubChem PUG REST API, allowing users to search, download, and manipulate chemical data from PubChem programmatically.

name: ApeTokenizer
one_line_profile: Tokenizer for chemical SMILES and SELFIES sequences
detailed_description: A specialized tokenizer designed for processing chemical string representations like SMILES and SELFIES, optimized for use with transformer-based machine learning models in chemistry.

name: Rxn-INSIGHT
one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing chemical databases and predicting reaction conditions
detailed_description: A cheminformatics tool for analyzing chemical reaction databases and predicting reaction conditions. It aids in understanding reaction patterns and optimizing synthetic routes.

name: Cactus
one_line_profile: LLM Agent leveraging cheminformatics tools for informed responses
detailed_description: An LLM-based agent developed by PNNL that integrates various cheminformatics tools to provide accurate and informed responses to chemistry-related queries, acting as a retrieval-augmented generation system.

name: ChemSpot
one_line_profile: Named entity recognition tool for identifying chemical mentions in natural language texts
detailed_description: ChemSpot is a tool designed to identify mentions of chemicals in text, covering trivial names, drugs, abbreviations, molecular formulas, and IUPAC entities. It employs a hybrid approach combining a Conditional Random Field (CRF) with a dictionary to handle the diverse naming characteristics of chemical entities.

name: RXNMapper
one_line_profile: Unsupervised attention-guided atom-mapping tool for chemical reactions
detailed_description: RXNMapper provides a method for atom-mapping chemical reactions using an unsupervised attention-guided approach. It extracts organic chemistry grammar from chemical reactions, serving as a critical component for reaction prediction and mechanism understanding tasks.

name: MolFlux
one_line_profile: A foundational package for molecular predictive modelling and drug discovery
detailed_description: A Python library developed by Exscientia for molecular predictive modelling. It provides a foundational framework to build, train, and evaluate models for drug discovery and chemical properties, integrating with the Hugging Face ecosystem.

name: USPTO-LLM
one_line_profile: LLM-assisted information-enriched chemical reaction dataset
detailed_description: A dataset and benchmarking resource derived from USPTO data, enriched using Large Language Models to assist in chemical reaction prediction and analysis tasks.

name: PaRoutes
one_line_profile: Framework for benchmarking multi-step retrosynthesis predictions
detailed_description: A framework designed to benchmark route predictions in multi-step retrosynthesis. It provides tools to evaluate the feasibility and efficiency of synthetic routes generated by AI models.

name: rxnpredict
one_line_profile: Predicting reaction performance using machine learning
detailed_description: An R package for predicting the performance (e.g., yield, selectivity) of chemical reactions using machine learning techniques.

name: chembench
one_line_profile: Automated benchmark for evaluating LLMs on chemistry tasks
detailed_description: A Python package for benchmarking Large Language Models (LLMs) on various chemistry-related questions and tasks to assess their domain knowledge and reasoning.

name: smiles2actions
one_line_profile: Action sequence prediction for chemical equations
detailed_description: A tool to predict the sequence of experimental actions required to perform a chemical reaction given its chemical equation (SMILES).

name: ChemBench
one_line_profile: MoleculeNet benchmark dataset & MolMapNet dataset loader
detailed_description: A repository providing access to MoleculeNet benchmark datasets and MolMapNet datasets, facilitating the evaluation of molecular property prediction models.

name: SciML-Bench
one_line_profile: SciML Benchmarking Suite for AI for Science
detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate AI models across various scientific domains (AI for Science), providing standardized metrics and datasets.

name: LinChemIn
one_line_profile: Toolkit for analyzing and benchmarking chemical synthetic routes
detailed_description: A Python toolkit that leverages the connectivity of chemical reaction data to provide actionable insights and calculate metrics on predicted chemical synthetic routes from various CASP tools.
